content.text:
# Wario (disambiguation)

Wario is a Nintendo video game character from the Mario game franchise.
Wario may also refer to:
People
* Hassan Wario (born 1970), Kenyan politician
* Golich Juma Wario, Kenyan politician
* Ali Wario, a Kenyan politician; a Member of Parliament representing Bura Constituency
Fictional characters
* Baby Wario, a videogame character from Nintendo in the Mario game franchise
* Wario Hashida (), a fictional character from Cute High Earth Defense Club Love!
Games
* Wario (series), a videogame series from Nintendo in the Mario-franchise
* Wario: Master of Disguise, a 2007 Nintendo videogame in the Wario-series of the Mario-franchise
Other uses
* "Wario" (TV segment), a 2021 comedic TV skit from Saturday Night Live; see List of unofficial Mario media
See also
* List of Wario video games, the Wario-subseries of Mario-franchise videogames from Nintendo
*
* Waria (disambiguation)
* WARY
* Wari (disambiguation)
** Wali (disambiguation)
* Ware (disambiguation)
* War (disambiguation)
* Warionia
